metadata.title: CVE-2019-12111 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
A Denial Of Service vulnerability in MiniUPnP MiniUPnPd through 2.1 existsdue to a NULL pointer dereference in copyIPv6IfDifferent in pcpserver.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-12111` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

miniupnpd - 2.1-6ubuntu2
miniupnpd-iptables - 2.1-6ubuntu2
miniupnpd-nftables - 2.1-6ubuntu2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: miniupnpd package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.1-6ubuntu2').
